title: President, CEO and Founder of Horizon Media, Bill Koenigsberg, Named to Variety Magazine's Prestigious "Gotham 60" List
text:
Horizon Media
"Gotham 60" List Honors Most Influential New Yorkers in Media and Entertainment
NEW YORK , Oct. 2, Horizon Media , the largest and fastest growing privately held media services agency in the world, is pleased to announce that Bill Koenigsberg , its President, Founder and Chief Executive Officer, has been named to Variety's Gotham 60: Influential New Yorkers in Entertainment and Media list this week. The esteemed list profiles Variety Magazine's pick of New Yorkers who have made an impact in the past year on the city's entertainment and media scene.
Bill Koenigsberg's Gotham 60 honor by Variety Magazine recognizes his exceptional contributions to the New York media industry and his visionary point of view on the future of the agency model. Under Koenigsberg's direction, Horizon has secured a dozen new business wins this year alone. The agency has been named to Crain's New York Business Best Places to Work in NYC list for the third year in a row, and has recently been named one of the Best Places to Work in Los Angeles by the Los Angeles Business Journal .
"I'm honored to be named alongside New York's most renowned luminaries in media and entertainment," said Bill Koenigsberg , President, CEO, and Founder of Horizon Media. "We are operating in an evolving media environment that is in flux, and there has never been a more exciting time to invent, create, grow and transform the industry in the process."
The Gotham 60 list includes media heavy-hitters such as power couple Beyonce and Jay Z; host of The Late Show, Stephen Colbert ; and actor-writer-producer-comedian, Fred Armisen , among others. The Gotham 60 honorees were celebrated at an intimate cocktail party at the New York Film Festival on Monday, September 28 .
The Gotham 60 recognition follows a slew of awards and honors for Bill Koenigsberg . In 2014, he was inducted to the Broadcasting and Cable Hall of Fame, which honors pioneers and innovators of the electronic arts. In 2014, Koenigsberg was also the first-ever media executive to be named board chair of the 4A's. Bill is also the only person to receive the prestigious Advertising Age Media Maven Award twice. Koenigsberg has also been named Media Executive of the Year by Mediaweek, and has also been featured as one of its top 50 most influential executives in the industry.
Recognized and respected throughout the world of show business, Variety is the premier source of entertainment news. Since 1905, the most influential leaders in the industry have turned to Variety for timely, credible and straightforward news and analysis.
About Horizon Media
Horizon Media , Inc. is the largest and fastest growing privately held media services agency in the world. The company was founded in 1989, is headquartered in New York and has offices in Los Angeles , San Diego , and Chicago . Horizon Media was chosen as 2011 Independent Media Agency of the Year by Mediapost, 2010 U.S. Media Agency of the Year by Adweek, Brandweek, and Mediaweek as well as by Ad Age and as one of the world's ten most innovative marketing and advertising companies by Fast Company in 2011. In 2012, Bill Koenigsberg , President, CEO and Founder, was honored by Advertising Age as Industry Executive of the Year. Most recently, in 2014, Bill Koenigsberg was named 4As Chair of the Board and is the first person from a media agency to hold this prestigious position in the 100 year history of the 4As, the marketing industry's leading trade association.
The company's mission is "To create the most meaningful brand connections within the lives of people everywhere." By delivering on this mission through a holistic approach to brand marketing, Horizon Media has become one of the largest and fastest-growing media agencies in the industry, with estimated billings of over $6.3 billion and over 1,200 employees.
The company is also a founding member of Columbus Media International, a multi-national partnership of independent media agencies. For more information, please visit horizonmedia.com.
